main_page_title_1: Discover the world of personalized interests with
main_page_text_1: Your new way to organize and share your interests.
main_page_text_2: Link your favorite services, create links with custom title and manage your products all on one platform.
main_page_tab_text_1: Link your favorite apps like Discord and Spotify to Ulifyi and get even more features.
main_page_tab_text_2: Create personalized links with your own title and redirect URL for easy management.
main_page_tab_text_3: Associate your products with your links and increase visibility and sales.
main_page_title_3: Optimize your online presence with Ulifyi
main_page_text_3: Ulifyi offers you a wide range of tools and features to improve your online presence and make your business more successful. Benefit from faster processing, optimized technology, secure management, a user-friendly interface and targeted features.
main_page_category_text_1: Ulifyi processes your shortcuts and links faster than any other platform.
main_page_category_text_2: Ulifyi uses the latest technology to give you optimal performance.
main_page_category_text_3: Ulifyi provides additional security through its secure management of your data.
main_page_category_text_4: With Ulifyi, companies have the opportunity to enhance their online presence by integrating social media channels and product presentations. Use the platform's capabilities to strengthen your brand and reach potential customers.
main_page_category_text_5: Ulifyi is easy to use and offers an intuitive interface.
main_page_category_text_6: Ulifyi helps you achieve your goals faster by managing your shortcuts and links.
main_page_text_4: Our technology is valued by a wide range of companies around the world.
no_account: Don't have an account yet? Register now!
already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign up now!
beta_info: Ulifyi is currently in beta. There may be bugs. Please report them to us so we can fix them.
overview_text: Here you will find an overview of your data.
overview_info_text: üéâ Congratulations! üéâ You are now a Beta Tester of Ulifyi. You can now use all the features that we make available to you. We hope you enjoy Ulifyi. We are happy about feedback and bug reports.
connection_text: On our site we offer you the possibility to connect your different online accounts.
connection_info_text: üëã Welcome to the beta phase of our new Discord and Spotify connection feature! We're glad you're a part of it. Please note that there may be bugs or disruptions during the beta phase. We appreciate their feedback to improve the feature üëç Happy Linking!
link_text: On our site we offer you the possibility to manage your various links.
link_info: üëã Welcome to the beta phase of our new links feature! We're glad you're a part of it. Please note that there may be bugs or interruptions during the beta phase. We value your feedback, to improve the function üëç Have fun creating links!

create_product_text: On our site we offer you the possibility to manage your different products.
product_max_500px: The product image must be a maximum of 500px wide and high!
product_type_info: Depending on the product type, the button on your profile varies. It is therefore important that you select the correct and suitable type.
product_redirect_info: The redirect is the URL the user will be redirected to when they click the button.
product_tags_info: Tags are important keywords that describe the product. You can add a maximum of 5 tags.
product_price_info: The price is the price the user has to pay when they click the button. (No euro sign is needed)
product_discount_info: The discount is the discount the user gets when they click the button. (No percent sign is needed)
edit_product_text: On our site we offer you the possibility to manage your different products.
product_was_updated: The product was updated successfully! You will be redirected shortly...
username_too_short: Username is too short! (At least 3 characters)
name_too_short: Name is too short! (At least 3 characters)
username_too_long: The username is too long! (Maximum 20 characters)
name_too_long: The name is too long! (Maximum 20 characters)
edit_profile_text: On our site we offer you the possibility to edit your profile.
edit_profile_info: üëã Welcome to the Edit Profile beta! We're glad you're a part of it. Please note that there may be bugs or disruptions during the beta period. avatar_info: Avatar (Click on avatar to change it)
avatar_info2: Your avatar should be a maximum of 150 x 150 px. PNG, JPG or GIF.
dont_forget_to_save: Don't forget to save your changes!
settings_text: Here you can make important configurations for your Ulifyi account.
appearance_text: Here you can customize the appearance of your Ulifyi profile.
language_text: Here you can change the language of your Ulifyi profile.
language_info: The language of your Ulifyi profile is automatically set to the language of your browser. If you want to change the language of your Ulifyi profile, you can do it here.
error_captcha: An error occurred! Please complete the captcha!
error_accept_terms: You must accept the terms of use and privacy policy!
info_tmg_text2: The owners are responsible for the content of this website.
disclaimer_text: The contents of our pages were created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the content. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages under the general laws according to ¬ß 7 para.1 TMG.
disclaimer_text2: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, on whose contents we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal contents were not recognizable at the time of linking.
what_is_text_1: Ulifyi is an innovative social media platform that allows users to showcase and sell their products and services online. With our user-friendly and intuitive interface, anyone can present their goods in an engaging way and reach potential customers.
what_is_text_2: We offer all the features you would expect from a modern social media platform, such as the ability to share, like and comment on products. In addition, we are continuously working to optimize our platform and add new features to provide the best possible experience for our users.
what_is_text_3: As a young and dynamic company, we are proud to provide our users with a platform that enables them to successfully market and sell their products and services online. We look forward to welcoming you to Ulifyi and shaping the future of online marketing together.
why_text_1: Because we focus on the needs of sellers and business owners. Our platform offers a simple and intuitive user interface so you can present and sell your products in an appealing way.
why_text_2: With features like product sharing, liking and commenting, we are constantly striving to improve our platform and add new features to give you the best experience possible. Our goal is to help you expand your business and successfully sell your products. With Ulifyi you have everything you need to be successful.
ulifyi_future: What are ULIFYI's plans for the future?
ulifyi_future_text_1: Ulifyi aims to unite online commerce and social media. Our platform enables both business owners and private users to present and sell their products in an easy and appealing way.
ulifyi_future_text_2: We strive to create a large and active community where everyone can discover and share each other's goods and services. By constantly improving our platform and introducing new features, we aim to revolutionize the way people interact and do business online. Ulifyi is, in our opinion, the future of social media and online shopping platforms.
who_is_after_ulifyi_text_1: Ulifyi was founded by a group of visionary entrepreneurs who set out to revolutionize the world of social media and online commerce. We specialize in developing a platform that allows business owners and private users to easily and effectively showcase and sell their products and services.
who_is_after_ulifyi_text_2: Our team consists of experienced developers, marketers, and entrepreneurs who are focused on providing you with the best possible experience on our platform. We look forward to welcoming you to Ulifyi and shaping the future of online marketing together.
